A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Garbled mess. Filled with plot-holes\, side-quests that lead to nothing\, characters that don't progress\, and the terrible handling of old characters. 
At this point\, I'm glad all the old characters are dead\, as now we won't get disappointed by how tasteless they get treated in this trilogy. 
The Luke ending was terrible\, it started out hopeful but then transitioned into something that seriously couldn't have been approved by proper screenwriters. 
All characters seem to be caricatures that stick within their description providing no interesting value beyond a brief moment between Rey and Kylo Renn (who is arguably the only character that has some kind of interesting depth to him). 
I know the excuse often is that it's a kids movie\, but that's nonsense given the intricate plot-themes it tries to push\, and the tie-ins with old movie themes\, plots and characters. 
All in all\, a mess with no thread other than 'burn the past'\, sorry but I think until this stuff gets any better\, I'd rather 'burn the present' ;)
Better luck next time!
